item.title: Nasdaq futures rise to start the week as Tesla shares jump: Live updates
item.description: Stock futures were mixed Monday as Wall Street awaits major earnings reports this week and monitors the state of the postelection rally.

item.title: China to front-load 2025 local government special bonds quota, report says
item.description: China's finance ministry is planning to front-load part of the 2025 local government special bonds quota to meet funding needs for major infrastructur...

item.title: Budget travel icon Spirit Airlines files for bankruptcy protection after mounting losses
item.description: The airline hasn't posted an annual profit since 2019 and lost more than $335 million in the first half of the year.

item.title: Xiaomi Q3 revenue soars 30.5% as sales of its first electric car surge
item.description: Chinese electronics maker Xiaomi Corp posted a 30.5% jump in third-quarter revenue as consumers clamoured for its first electric vehicle, the SU7 seda...

item.title: Tesla stock pops 8% in premarket after report Trump wants to relax U.S. self-driving rules
item.description: Elon Musk was a central figure in the business world pushing for Trump's return to the White House in the lead-up to this month's elections.
